title: National Mall and Memorial Parks: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps              Wayfinding Map NPSMap  National Mall Wayfinding Map Use the National Mall award-winning wayfinding map to navigate your way around the monuments and memorials on the National Mall. High Res JPEG (15MB)  PDF (2MB)  PDF (572KB)          DC sites map icon NPSMap  Detail Map of Washington, D.C. Sites Check out these sites in and around the National Mall. This map shows additional  government buildings and museums around Washington, D.C.      PDF Map (6.3MB)   PDF Map (338KB)            Icon of Hains Point. NPSMap  Hains Point Detail Map Check out these maps for a close look at the Hains Point area. Hains Point offers a bounty of recreational opportunities including biking or running along Ohio Drive, golfing at the East Potomac Golf Course, or playing on the Hains Point playground.  PDF Map (2.5MB)  JPEG Map (3.2MB)  JPEG Map (422KB)          Tour bus parking NPSPhoto  Tour Bus Parking Map Are you a tour bus operator for the Washington, D.C. area? Check out this map for the best pick-up/drop-off sites around the National Mall. PDF Map (2.8MB)
